thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Mar Hernández Escudero
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Mar Hernández Escudero

author: Mar Hernández Escudero
title: Mar Hernández Escudero
text:
I've been buying at Banggood for three years now. Everything had arrived on time, on good condition and are items that are still working -so, good quality-.
A couple of months ago I have the little problem that something didn't arrive and they quickly proceed first to replace it but since it was imposible (out of stock) they gave me my money back in just two days.
Their treatment is very good and pleased towards the client.
